simpledes: Number of individuals in a group.
longtype: Number of units in a given group
longpop: The base unit is the individual (rather than the household). This is equivalent to assuming no sharing of resources within couples.
longage: The population is comprised of individuals of all ages.
source: WID.world computations using: [URL][URL_LINK]https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/[/URL_LINK][URL_TEXT]UN World Population Prospects (2015).[/URL_TEXT][/URL]
method: Total 2016 population estimated by extending past year observed population growth rate. Data on other years comes from the UN World Population Prospects (2015)
